column5: I am still yet to land my first nickel smallie. Biggest here was 4.9. Missed landing a big pike and didnt get pics of every fish we caught but its a start.     This one came up from 15 fow and hammered X-rap. First bass on slashbait/jerkbait.
Some from shore here in Montreal.
How does that chair handle the rapids? Seriously some nice smallies and a few walleye to boot.
Good mix bag of fish Canucker Well done Leechman
I could easily fish with you wackos...lol...  Nice shootin...
That first one is a fatty couldn't help but notice that hat
Awesome.  Looks like you guys have a great time.  Cheers
nice bass and eyes i like the chair awesome
Ya the first one is the closest to 5 I ever got.
No nickels, but some great looking fish there!  When you can catch smallies, walleye and pike, you cant complain!  Great job.  Love the pic of you in that chair!!! Classic!!!
